name: EQ Survival Manual
description:
"It's been many days since you last saw someone, longing for just a friendly face.
You think you've seen a group nearby, but are you welcome to join them should you approach them?"

This multi-choice game aims to encourage the player to make pro-social choices.
The premise is to be accepted by a group, with individual scores from each group member.

Created for the Twine Survival Guide Jam

Team

Nikivc - Story / graphics
LordDz - Twine / css
Anna - Playtester
